overview: A mockumentary following Harry, an egotistical and amateur young play director leading up to the opening night of his first play. Harry intends to impress his older sister Liz who he holds in high regard but with a low budget and a subpar cast, the odds are kind of against him.
tagline: An eccentric (and amateur) stage director scrambles together a performance to impress his judgemental older sister.
title: Vermilion
